    • buildRule

      private Rule buildRule​(java.lang.String name, int NOMmin, int NOMmax, int LOCclassmin, int LOCclassmax, int WMCmin, int WMCmax, boolean classConjunction, int LOCmin, int LOCmax, int CYCLOmin, int CYCLOmax, boolean methodConjunction)
      Builds Rule
      Parameters:
      name - Rules name
      NOMmin - Minimum number of methods of class
      NOMmax - Maximum number of methods of class
      LOCclassmin - Minimum Lines of class
      LOCclassmax - Maximum Lines of class
      WMCmin - Minimum cyclomatic of class
      WMCmax - Maximum cyclomatic of class
      classConjunction - Class conjunction indicator
      LOCmin - Minimum Lines of method
      LOCmax - Maximum Lines of method
      CYCLOmin - Minimum cyclomatic of method
      CYCLOmax - Maximum cyclomatic of method
      methodConjunction - Method Conjunction indicator
      Returns:
